main_title: California Route Plan: Paris to Southern California (7 Days, 8 Travelers)

outline.summary: Cover slide with title, subtitle, and presenter info
content_outline: Title: California Route Plan (7 Days)
Subtitle: Paris → Los Angeles → San Diego → Palm Springs/Joshua Tree → Los Angeles
Presenter: Trip Planner — II Agent
Background image: Los Angeles skyline at sunset

outline.summary: High-level summary of the 7-day SoCal loop with key themes and pace
content_outline: Group size: 8 travelers; Dates: 21–27 Apr 2025 (7 days)
Route: LA (city + beaches) → San Diego (coast + culture) → Palm Springs/Joshua Tree (desert + stargazing) → LA (departure)
Pace: Moderate; 3 hotel bases; ~2–3 hours driving on transfer days
Transport: 2 large SUVs or 1 passenger van
Goal: Balance outdoor highlights with indoor contingencies using late‑April climate normals

outline.summary: Arrival/departure, car rental plan, lodging footprint for group of 8
content_outline: Flights: Paris (CDG) → Los Angeles (LAX). Return from LAX. Overnight flight options for return.
Ground: 2 full-size SUVs (7–8 seaters) or 1× 12–15 passenger van; factor luggage space.
Lodging bases: LA (2 nights), San Diego (2 nights), Palm Springs (2 nights) → 6 total nights.
Neighborhood targets: LA (Santa Monica or West Hollywood), San Diego (Little Italy or La Jolla), Palm Springs (Downtown).
Check-in/out timing buffers; valet/parking considerations (US$20–50/day).

outline.summary: What to expect weather-wise and how it maps to activities
content_outline: Los Angeles: ~23°C high / 14°C low; low rain; morning marine layer likely; pleasant afternoons.
San Diego: ~20–21°C high / 14°C low; very low rain; coastal breeze; cool evenings.
Palm Springs: ~31–33°C high / 16–18°C low; dry heat; strong sun; pool/stay hydrated.
Joshua Tree (higher elevation): ~24–26°C high / 8–10°C low; potential wind; cooler nights.
Implication: Favor desert hikes early AM; coastal/outdoor afternoons; have indoor museums/tours as backups.

outline.page_title: Day 1 — Mon 21 Apr: Paris → Los Angeles
outline.summary: Arrival, shakeout day by the ocean
content_outline: CDG → LAX flight; arrive midday/afternoon local time (UTC−7).
Check in: Santa Monica or West Hollywood.
Light activities: Santa Monica Pier & beach walk; Third Street Promenade.
Dinner: Group-friendly reservations on Ocean Ave or in Venice.
Contingency: If tired or cloudy, opt for early dinner and hotel rest.

outline.page_title: Day 2 — Tue: Los Angeles City & Hills
outline.summary: Iconic views and flexible indoor/outdoor mix
content_outline: Morning: Griffith Observatory & Hollywood Sign views (outdoor vistas).
Midday: Warner Bros. Studio Tour or Academy Museum of Motion Pictures (indoor).
Afternoon: LACMA Urban Light + The Grove/Farmers Market or Beverly Hills stroll.
Evening: West Hollywood dining; optional rooftop bar.
Backups: The Broad (reservations), Petersen Automotive Museum, Getty Center (indoor/outdoor).

outline.summary: Scenic transfer day with coastal stops
content_outline: Drive I‑5 South; optional stop at San Clemente Pier or Oceanside Harbor.
Check in: Little Italy or La Jolla.
Afternoon: La Jolla Cove sea lions; kayaking (if calm seas) or coastal walk (outdoor).
Indoor contingency: Birch Aquarium or USS Midway Museum.
Dinner: Little Italy (group-friendly trattorias) or La Jolla village.

outline.page_title: Day 4 — Thu: San Diego Parks, Zoo, and Beaches
outline.summary: Mix museums with nature depending on weather
content_outline: Option A (clear day): Torrey Pines State Natural Reserve hike + Sunset at Sunset Cliffs.
Option B (marine layer/windy): Balboa Park museums (Fleet Science, SDMA) + San Diego Zoo.
Evening: Gaslamp Quarter or Little Italy; gelato and stroll.
Notes: Layer up for coastal breeze; parking fills early at Torrey Pines.

outline.page_title: Day 5 — Fri: San Diego → Palm Springs (2.5–3h)
content_outline: Morning transfer via I‑15/CA‑74 (check road advisories); brunch en route.
Palm Springs check-in; midday pool/siesta to avoid heat.
Late afternoon: Palm Springs Aerial Tramway (cooler temps up top) or Architecture tour.
Evening: Downtown Palm Springs dinner; reservations for 8 recommended.

outline.page_title: Day 6 — Sat: Joshua Tree National Park
outline.summary: Early start hikes and night sky
content_outline: Early AM entry; hikes: Hidden Valley, Barker Dam, Skull Rock; bring 3L water/person.
Lunch: Picnic in park or return to town midday heat.
Afternoon: Rest/pool or spa; evening stargazing spot inside park.
Backups: Palm Springs Art Museum; spa day if winds excessive; slot indoor activities.

outline.page_title: Day 7 — Sun: Palm Springs → Los Angeles → Paris
content_outline: Drive back to LAX (~2–3h).
LA brunch: Venice/Abbot Kinney or Downtown Arts District if time allows.
Last walk: Venice Canals or Santa Monica waterfront.
Evening/night flight LAX → CDG; arrive following day in Paris.
Los Angeles (2 nights): Santa Monica beachfront hotels; or West Hollywood boutique; 4 rooms or a large serviced apartment.
San Diego (2 nights): Little Italy modern hotels near dining; or La Jolla coastal stays; 4 rooms or 4–5BR vacation rental.
Palm Springs (2 nights): Downtown hotels or 4–5BR mid‑century villa with pool (check noise/party rules).
Ask for connected rooms; confirm parking for 2 vehicles or a van.

outline.summary: Easy group logistics and cuisine variety
content_outline: Plan dinners with reservations for 8, 5:30–7:30pm for best availability.
LA: Santa Monica seafood; West Hollywood Californian; casual tacos for lunches.
San Diego: Little Italy Italian; harbor seafood; casual fish tacos.
Palm Springs: Californian/American bistros; brunch cafes.
Dietary: capture preferences/allergies; split checks commonly accepted.
Lodging (6 nights, 4 rooms total): US$750–1,050 pp.
Transport (2 SUVs + fuel/parking): US$175–250 pp.
Activities (museums/tours/park fees): US$200–350 pp.
Food & drinks (~US$60–100/day): US$420–700 pp.
Subtotal (excl. flights): ~US$1,545–2,350 pp.
Add round-trip flight CDG–LAX: ~US$600–1,100 economy (variable).
Book studio/museum timed entries where available (The Broad, WB Tour).
Joshua Tree: US National Park Pass; start early; carry water/sun protection.
Driving: Observe HOV lane rules; watch for tolls; plan EV charging if applicable.
Tipping: 18–20% at restaurants; US$2–5 per valet; housekeeping discretionary.
Packing: Layers for coast, sun gear for desert; universal adapters; eSIM/roaming.
Review and confirm preferences (pace, interests).
Lock flights and refundable lodging.
Reserve timed entries and dining.
Contact: II Agent — Trip Planner.
